element-citation.article-title: Interobserver agreement of proliferation index (Ki-67) outperforms mitotic count in pulmonary carcinoids

citation-alternatives.mixed-citation: Warth, A. et al. Interobserver agreement of proliferation index (Ki-67) outperforms mitotic count in pulmonary carcinoids. Virchows Archiv: Int. J. Pathol.462, 507–513. 10.1007/s00428-013-1408-2 (2013).
